channel.title: RSCD wont allow connections
channel.description:
I got the rscd v25 and I edited and crap and when I run it on my Dedicated it wont let people connect, Someone told me a while back that there is a error in the rscd v25 server that wont allow connections but idk..
So, if this is right what file do I gotta go in to fix it.. - I am not asking how to code it..
EDIT: It runs.. Just to let you know I can connect to it using "localhost"
and yes the ports are open lol so don't be saying anything about that crap its just when I change it to the dedicated ip it wont let other people connect.. Or this is client sided idk I changed the 'settings.ini' to the right way so yea.

item.title: RSCD wont allow connections
item.dc:creator: @dear_god1 dear god
item.description:
@dear_god1 wrote:

[quote=“anc13nts1, post:5, topic:234091”]okay look…

This is my is conf.

[code]<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>

RSCD-LS Config localhost rscd root localhost 34522 localhost 8181 [/code]

This is my world.xml

[code]<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>

RSCD Config 2000 localhost 43594 RSCDaemon Scotland 800 1 localhost 34522 [/code]

this is my conf.xml

[code]<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>

Demonik Config 2000 localhost 43594 DemonikOnline Dallas 800 3 localhost 34522 [/code]

thats how its set I also just thought of something that might work IM doubting it will though[/quote]

shouldn’t post this, if you aren’t secure someone could seriously fuck up your server.

happened to me

also pm me on msn, i’ll help you with it.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD wont allow connections
item.dc:creator: @anc13nts1 anc13nts1
item.description:
@anc13nts1 wrote:

okay look…

This is my is conf.

[code]<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>

RSCD-LS Config localhost rscd root localhost 34522 localhost 8181 [/code]

This is my world.xml

[code]<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>

RSCD Config 2000 localhost 43594 RSCDaemon Scotland 800 1 localhost 34522 [/code]

this is my conf.xml

[code]<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>

Demonik Config 2000 localhost 43594 DemonikOnline Dallas 800 3 localhost 34522 [/code]

thats how its set I also just thought of something that might work IM doubting it will though

Read full topic

I got the rscd v25 and I edited and crap and when I run it on my Dedicated it wont let people connect, Someone told me a while back that there is a error in the rscd v25 server that wont allow connections but idk…
